mapper.update:
update WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM
CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_SEQ = #{codeCfcSysItemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_CD = #{codeCfcSysItemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_FRM = #{codeCfcSysItemFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_LEN = #{codeCfcSysItemLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_SPT = #{codeCfcSysItemSpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_TBL = #{codeCfcSysItemRefTbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_COL = #{codeCfcSysItemRefCol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_ID = #{codeCfcSysItemRefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM set CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_SEQ = #{codeCfcSysItemSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_CD = #{codeCfcSysItemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_FRM = #{codeCfcSysItemFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_LEN = #{codeCfcSysItemLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_SPT = #{codeCfcSysItemSpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_TBL = #{codeCfcSysItemRefTbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_COL = #{codeCfcSysItemRefCol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_REF_ID = #{codeCfcSysItemRefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*
FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM A
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM_SEQ

SELECT A.* , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM A WHERE CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY EXP_DTM DESC, STR_DTM DESC
